meaningMnemonic: We <kanji>pass through</kanji> this <kanji>point</kanji> <kanji>together</kanji>. This point is our <vocabulary>common point</vocabulary>. It is where our ideas, philosophies, and bodies pass through each other.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
